com.example.habitup.Controller

Class HabitUpApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.habitup.Controller.HabitUpApplication

  • public class HabitUpApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    HabitUpApplication is the controller at the app-level. It deals with functionality at the highest level, including checking for connectivity, dealing with logins, and anything to do with other users such as friends and following. It is also the store of static variables that are useful to be stored at the app level.
    Author:
    gojeffcho Javadoc last updated 2017-11-13 by @gojeffcho
